artist: Painter: After Peter Monamy; Designer: Elisha Kirkall; Engraver: Thomas Burford
description: moonlit coastal scene with two figures in center foreground gesturing toward boat moored in the middle distance; town in distance; figure on path at right with archway and tower
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image on sheet in black : T. Monamy pinxit  Moon Rising    Lever de la Lune.  E. Kirkall fec. / T. Burford Exe\'t | in pencil on sheet: 2-83
title: Moon Rising
